thread.title: The Latest: Man in cold case says he pushed girl down stairs
thread.title_full: The Latest: Man in cold case says he pushed girl down stairs - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Latest: Man in cold case says he pushed girl down stairs
text:
MILWAUKEE (AP) - The latest on charges in the cold case of a Milwaukee girl who went missing more than three decades ago (all times local):
11:30 a.m.
A man charged with murder in the disappearance 33 years ago of a 13-year-old Milwaukee girl has confessed that he pushed her down stairs to her death.
A criminal complaint against 50-year-old Jose Ferreira says he told authorities he pushed Carrie Ann Jopek during a party in 1982. He told police he saw her hit her head and thought she was unconscious. He later realized her neck was broken.
The document says Ferreira told authorities he buried the girl under a porch, where her body was found 17 months later.
Ferreira was arrested last week after he called a crisis help line and local television station and discussed case details.
He has been charged with second-degree murder and faces 20 years in prison.
His lawyer hasn't responded to messages Monday.
